short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for tracking application usage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Viio is a SaaS Management solution, helping organizations manage their SaaS stack. The Viio Chrome Extension for tracking application usage provides insights to which SaaS applications are being used across an organization.
